enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Enables/Disables all features of the addon

autoMessageConfiguration.name: Auto Message
autoMessageConfiguration.description: The 'Auto Message' feature sends a message when a game ends

text.name: Message
text.description: This message will be send when a game ends

repeatText.name: Secondary Message
repeatText.description: This message will be used if the first message fails to send

delay.name: Delay (in seconds)
delay.description: This delay (in seconds) is waited after the game ends and before the message is send

fastPlayConfiguration.name: Fast Play
fastPlayConfiguration.description: The 'Fast Play' feature adds keys to join a game mode quickly and also enables you to automatically join a new game directly when the previous game ends

manageElements.name: Manage Fast Play
manageElements.description: Here you can manage your keys to join a specific mode

playAgain.name: Play Again
playAgain.description: When pressing this key you will automatically join the last game mode you played

auto.name: Auto Join
auto.description: Enables/Disables if you will automatically join a new game after the previous game ended

delay.name: Delay (in seconds)
delay.description: This delay is waited before automatically joining a new game after the previous game ended

tipConfiguration.name: Auto Tip
tipConfiguration.description: The 'Auto Tip' feature tips all players every few minutes

delay.name: Delay (in minutes)
delay.description: This delay is waited before the next time '/tip all' gets executed

showMessage.name: Show Tip Message
showMessage.description: Enables/Disables if you will receive a message when tipping a player

showErrorMessage.name: Show Error Message
showErrorMessage.description: Enables/Disables if you will receive a message when the command fails

glowing.name: Allow Glowing
glowing.description: Enables/Disables if you will see the glowing effect in lobbies

title.remove: Do you really want to remove this entry?

playAgain.missing: You have to play a game mode first.
playAgain.disabled: This game mode is not supported.
